content: lion brand pattern # 60396 published in lion brand yarn catalog - 2006 w skill level easy + level 3 lion® wool article #820 a 948 yards b 632 yards *scarlet & rose* *ed note if you are substituting another yarn it must be 100% feltable wool if you plan to felt the project * crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm bag body is worked in rounds with 2 strands of yarn held together throughout rose ruffle is worked in row with 1 strand of yarn in contrast color arrange ruffle into a spiral on front with tail sew ruffle to front assemble bag before felting *free registration at site required to access patterns *
